amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt the Environmental Quality Incentives Program from the $60,000 payment limitation contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 110-261 to exempt the Environmental Quality Incentives Program (EQIP) from the $60,000 and $125,000 payment limitations, resetting it to the $450,000 limitation that is in the current law.

action.text: Manzullo amendment (A010) modified by unanimous consent. Modification consist of replacement text.
On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A010) as modified Failed by voice vote.
